Código de error: 0x%3!8.8X!</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-4113">The ProcessInput method on component "%1" (%2!d!) failed with error code 0x%3!8.8X!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="544ff-4114">mientras se procesaba la entrada "%4" (%5!d!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-4114">while processing input "%4" (%5!d!).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="544ff-4115">El componente identificado devolvió un error del método ProcessInput.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-4115">The identified component returned an error from the ProcessInput method.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="544ff-4116">El error es específico del componente, pero es irrecuperable y detendrá la ejecución de la tarea Flujo de datos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-4116">The error is specific to the component, but the error is fatal and will cause the Data Flow task to stop running.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="544ff-4117">Puede que haya otros mensajes de error expuestos anteriores a éste con más información sobre el error.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-4117">There may be error messages posted before this with more information about the failure.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9815">0x8020831C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9815">0x8020831C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9816">-2145352932</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9816">-2145352932</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9817">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_TIMESTAMPCAVEAT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9817">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_TIMESTAMPCAVEAT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9818">La columna de referencia "%1" puede ser una columna de marca de tiempo de SQL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9818">The reference column "%1" may be a SQL timestamp column.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="544ff-9819">Cuando se cree el índice de coincidencias aproximadas y una copia de la tabla de referencia, todas las marcas de tiempo de la tabla de referencia reflejarán el estado actual de la tabla en el momento de la copia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9819">When the fuzzy match index is built, and a copy of the reference table is made, all reference table timestamps will reflect the current state of the table at the time of the copy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="544ff-9820">Puede producirse un comportamiento inesperado si se establece el valor False en CopyReferenceTable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9820">Unexpected behavior may occur if the CopyReferenceTable is set to false.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9821">0x80208321</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9821">0x80208321</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9822">-2145352927</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9822">-2145352927</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9823">DTS_W_MATCHINDEXALREADYEXISTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9823">DTS_W_MATCHINDEXALREADYEXISTS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9824">Ya existe una tabla con el nombre '%1' asignado a MatchIndexName y DropExistingMatchIndex tiene el valor FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9824">A table with the name '%1' given for MatchIndexName already exists and DropExistingMatchIndex is set to FALSE.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="544ff-9825">No se podrá ejecutar la transformación a menos que se quite la tabla, se especifique otro nombre o se establezca el valor TRUE a DropExisitingMatchIndex.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9825">Transform execution will fail unless this table is dropped, a different name is specified, or DropExisitingMatchIndex is set to TRUE.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9826">0x8020832B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9826">0x8020832B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9827">-2145352917</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9827">-2145352917</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9828">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_JOINLENGTHMISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9828">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_JOINLENGTHMISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9829">La longitud de la columna de entrada '%1' no es igual a la longitud de la columna de referencia '%2' en la que se buscan coincidencias.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9829">The length of input column '%1' is not equal to the length of the reference column '%2' that it is being matched against.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9830">0x8020832D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9830">0x8020832D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9831">-2145352915</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9831">-2145352915</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9832">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_CODEPAGE_MISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9832">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_CODEPAGE_MISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9833">Las páginas de códigos de la columna de origen DT_STR "%1" y la columna de destino DT_STR "%2" no coinciden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9833">The code pages of the DT_STR source column "%1" and the DT_STR dest column "%2" do not match.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="544ff-9834">Puede provocar resultados inesperados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9834">This may cause unexpected results.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9835">0x8020832E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9835">0x8020832E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9836">-2145352914</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9836">-2145352914</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9837">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_TOOMANYEXACTMATCHCOLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9837">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_TOOMANYEXACTMATCHCOLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9838">Hay más de 16 combinaciones de coincidencias exactas, de forma que es posible que el rendimiento no sea óptimo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9838">There are more than 16 exact match joins, so performance may not be optimal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="544ff-9839">Reduzca el número de combinaciones de coincidencias exactas para mejorar el rendimiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9839">Reduce the number of exact match joins to improve performance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="544ff-9840">SQL Server tiene un límite de 16 columnas por índice; el índice invertido se utilizará en todas las búsquedas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9840">SQL Server has a limit of 16 columns per index, the inverted index will be used for all lookups.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9841">0x80208350</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9841">0x80208350</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9842">-2145352880</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9842">-2145352880</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9843">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_MEMLIMITANDEXHAUSTIVESPECIFIED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9843">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_MEMLIMITANDEXHAUSTIVESPECIFIED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="544ff-9844">La opción Exhaustiva requiere que se cargue toda la referencia en la memoria principal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9844">The Exhaustive option requires that the entire reference be loaded into main memory.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="544ff-9845">Dado que se ha especificado un límite de memoria para la propiedad MaxMemoryUsage, es posible que toda la tabla de referencia no quepa dentro de este límite y que se produzca un error en tiempo de ejecución durante la operación de coincidencia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="544ff-9845">Since a memory limit has been specified for the MaxMemoryUsage property, it is possible that the entire reference table will not fit within this bound and that the match operation will fail at runtime.</span></span>|
